name: Cubic Accuracy
description:
DESCRIPTION

This game is all about BLASTING CUBES! Here you will be set in an environment of cubes that will incrementally get faster and more aggressive. You must use your precision and accuracy skills in order to shoot at the vengeful enemies. But be careful, if you happen to miss even a single bullet, you WILL lose the game. So, will you be the next champion who gets the highest score?

CONTROLS

LMB (left-click) to shoot. On mobile, tap.

MORE INFORMATION

Credits go to: Me, Myself, and I (Use3rnamed).

DEVELOPER'S HIGHSCORE: 242 (try to beat this)
Total DEV time: ~5 hours ( :/ not eligible for TriJam, well at least I tried. )
Good luck!

Assets used:
Music: "Sneaky Adventure" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
